lead_paragraph: Tim Jitloff used a go-for-broke second run at Sugarloaf in Maine to win his third straight giant slalom race at the United States alpine championships.

headline.main: Another Giant Slalom Title for Tim Jitloff

snippet: Tim Jitloff used a go-for-broke second run at Sugarloaf in Maine to win his third straight giant slalom race at the United States alpine championships.
